challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: You should use a comma separated element selector to select the input and textarea elements.
tests.testString:
const selFunc = selector => new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getStyle(selector);
assert.isTrue(['input, textarea', 'textarea, input'].some(selFunc));

tests.text: You should give the input and textarea elements a background-color of #0a0a23.
tests.testString:
const selFunc = selector => new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getStyle(selector);
assert.equal(selFunc(['input, textarea', 'textarea, input'].find(selFunc))?.backgroundColor, 'rgb(10, 10, 35)');

tests.text: You should give the input and textarea elements a 1px, solid border with a color of #0a0a23.

description: To make the input and textarea elements blend in with the background theme, set their background-color to #0a0a23. Then, give them a 1px, solid border with a color of #0a0a23.
